extendedInfo.description: Jatzan WordBlitz is a FREE fast action packed word game that will test your brain and reflexes! The premise is simple. Tap on letters as they drop to make a word and then click on the check (tick) mark. Each word increases your score. Some letters, e.g. Z, are worth more than others. Longer words will increase your score faster. Using the smaller letters that may appear will also increase your score quicker. If you select the wrong letter, don't worry, just click on the cross which will clear your selected letters. You have just 180 seconds to get the highest score you can. Don't allow too many leters to fill up the screen or the game will be over. Master the balance of getting the longest, highest-scoring words you can, with keeping the screen manageable. Sounds easy? Think you can get the highest score? We will be adding an online leaderboard shortly, so you can compare your score with others around the world! Get practicing now and tell your friends. Jatzan WordBlitz is THE thinking person's game of 2011!

reviews.title: Can\'t Disable sounds
reviews.comment: Used to be able to disable sounds. Now the come back as soonas a game is opened. Fix this & I\'ll play again and change my rating!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GAME IS HARD & LOSING SUX!
reviews.comment: I\'m sure I sound like a complete MORON for saying this... it\'s fun but just too fast 4 us average folks! For those of us who aren\'t expert spellers, we wanna play too! Lol. B4 I know it, it\'s game over\" & I\'ve only got 3 words, my screen is full, & my time\'s up. (Whaaaah w/pouty lip!) U should add a no time limit mode, or mayb even just a 10 min mode & call it \"for spelling- bee dropouts\" or \"for intelligence- challenged peeps\", LOL... OR, BE  NON-ORIGINAL & call it what everyone else does, \"PRACTICE\"! LOL.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Alanna
reviews.comment: I love this game .. no quirks yet been addicted for months. Thx for a free game that\'s so fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: CJR: This is a very good word game and I really like this game .

reviews.comment: PLEASE UPDATE WITH VOLUME CONTROL, CAN\'T STAND THE MUSIC

reviews.title: Love this game!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for a fun challenging word game and this is it. So fun, addictive.
